Preference.app:summary: If nothing significant is going on (no music, no phone call, not charging etc) your device might fall asleep. (Only happens when the screen is off). When this happens, the volume keys won't work until the screen is turned on and the device wakes up.

SeekBarPreference.app:title: Prevent sleep timeout [minutes]
SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Prevent sleep this long after screen off. Zero means the device falls asleep whenever it pleases. Higher value means less sleep so more battery usage (but usually not too bad).
